entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 26 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 30 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 26 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 38 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 36 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Thursday 09 March 2023
